task.title: Washing Clothes in University Laundry Machines
task.shortdesc: University Housing offers all residents living on campus access to laundry facilities. Laundry machines are free for all residents.

prereq.p: Residents must use their own laundry detergents, fabric softeners, bleach, and other cleaning agents.

step.cmd: Separate clothes based on color or fabric type.
Load dirty clothes into the washing machine drum.

choices.choice: If using detergent pods, place the pod directly in the washing machine drum.
If using liquid detergent, pour into the dispenser drawer.

step.cmd: Add bleach and/or fabric softener to the dispenser drawer.
Select your settings with the control panel.

info.note: Settings will revert to default after each cycle.

taskbody.postreq: Set a timer to keep track of the time left on the machine. Remove all laundry promptly to allow others to use the machine.
